title: Gitea authentication fails
body:
When using OAuth2 authentication with Gitea, users receive error:

```
Error 401: Unauthorized
```

Steps to reproduce:
1. Configure OAuth2 provider
2. Attempt to log in
3. Observe authentication failure

title: Add REST API v2 endpoints
body:
We need to implement the following REST API endpoints for v2:

- GET /api/v2/repos
- POST /api/v2/repos
- DELETE /api/v2/repos/:id

This will improve compatibility with standard Git hosting APIs.
